name: part_006
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ一周年】エッ！？1時間でガチの即興曲を！？いい話もあるよ！【3DLIVE】 [as7iNw5gSi8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka discusses the anniversary song creation process and transitions to her performance.

subtitles.original: はいり始めているそうなので、
subtitles.english: I heard it's already starting, so...

subtitles.original: えっと、そうですね、あの、ちょっと本格的に今は、
subtitles.english: Well... yes, I think Kono-kun is currently...

subtitles.original: 多分頑張ってます、座員くん、ちょっと、
subtitles.english: ...doing his best for real, Kono-kun, a bit...

subtitles.original: 今、ちょっとね、一応マジのがちで作ってるから、
subtitles.english: Right now, I'm seriously making it for real, so...

subtitles.original: ちょっと、あと歌詞コメント、まとめといてください。
subtitles.english: ...please keep the lyrics coming in the comments.

subtitles.original: はい、歌詞ね。今出た歌詞、ちょっとまとめといてもらって、
subtitles.english: Yes, the lyrics. Keep the ones that just came out.

subtitles.original: これから、ちょっと、えっと、あの、個野さんの休憩を、
subtitles.english: And next... well, Kono-san's break...

subtitles.original: 休憩してねぇんだけどさ、今も、あの、ポルカの一応一周年なのでね、
subtitles.english:
...wait, you're not on break right now either.
Since it's Polka's 1st anniversary...

subtitles.original: ちょっとポルカも歌って、
subtitles.english: ...may Polka sing, too?

subtitles.original: 歌って、歌っていいですか？歌います！
subtitles.english: May I sing? I'm going to sing!

subtitles.original: 何も言わずとも！
subtitles.english: Even if you don't say anything!

subtitles.original: ねぇねぇ個野さん、なんかいい感じの入りをやってくれよ。かっこいい感じのさ、
subtitles.english:
Hey, Kono-san, give me a good intro.
Something cool!

subtitles.original: DEATH!
subtitles.english: DEATH!

subtitles.original: 俺も歌いたいんだーー！
subtitles.english: I want to sing too!

subtitles.original: 違う違う違う、ごめんごめん。ちょっと乗っちゃったんだけど、
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, sorry. I got a bit carried away.

subtitles.original: 実はね、持ってきた曲、ちょっとセクシー寄りなんだよ、この者。
subtitles.english:
Actually, the song I brought is a bit
on the sexy side.

subtitles.original: セクシー寄りなんだよ。なんかちょっとセクシー寄りの入りってないかな？
subtitles.english: It's on the sexy side. Is there a sexy-style intro?

subtitles.original: 逆に！
subtitles.english: On the contrary!

subtitles.original: いや、それは、だって。え？いいの？え？いいの？
subtitles.english: Well, that's because... eh? Is it okay? Eh? Is it okay?

subtitles.original: Suspect
subtitles.english: Suspect

subtitles.original: 意地悪ね 君をずっと
subtitles.english: You're so mean. It's not like I was

subtitles.original: 見ていたわけじゃない
subtitles.english: watching you the whole time.

subtitles.original: 僕の考えを 当ててごらんよ
subtitles.english: Try to guess what I'm thinking.

subtitles.original: 些細なしぐさ 視線 まばたき
subtitles.english: A subtle gesture, a glance, a blink

subtitles.original: 君はもう 手のひらに
subtitles.english: You're already in the palm of my hand.

subtitles.original: むき出しの罠 なんて かかるわけないわ
subtitles.english: There's no way I'd fall for such an obvious trap.

subtitles.original: 甘い言葉にも 惑わされない
subtitles.english: I won't be misled by sweet words.

subtitles.original: 心の奥の 奥の奥まで
subtitles.english: To the deepest, deepest part of your heart,

subtitles.original: 見透かしちゃうよ 行くよ
subtitles.english: I'll see right through you. Here I go!

subtitles.original: Lookin' Seekin' Touchin' Feelin'
subtitles.english: Lookin' Seekin' Touchin' Feelin'

subtitles.original: Seekin' Touchin' Feelin'
subtitles.english: Seekin' Touchin' Feelin'

subtitles.original: Ready?
subtitles.english: Ready?

subtitles.original: 自覚ないでしょうね 思い通りに
subtitles.english: You probably don't realize it, but you're being

subtitles.original: 君は動かされている
subtitles.english: moved exactly as I intended.

subtitles.original: ごっと 単純じゃないの
subtitles.english: God, it's not that simple.

subtitles.original: 駆け引きの火を
subtitles.english: Don't miss any of the sparks

subtitles.original: 全て見落とさないで
subtitles.english: of our bargaining.

subtitles.original: キミと 加速してく
subtitles.english: With you, our heartbeats

subtitles.original: 二人の鼓動
subtitles.english: are accelerating.

subtitles.original: 心理戦は 次のステージへ
subtitles.english: The psychological battle moves to the next stage.

subtitles.original: 映るその目に 私はどう映るの
subtitles.english: How do I look in those eyes reflecting me?

subtitles.original: とても煌びやかで まるでシンデレラ
subtitles.english: So glittering, just like Cinderella.

subtitles.original: 突き刺さる視線 隙間感じて
subtitles.english: Feeling the gap between our piercing glares,

subtitles.original: 君に余裕見せつけて
subtitles.english: I'll show you my composure.

subtitles.original: あからさますぎて お腹よじれるよ
subtitles.english: You're so obvious, it's making me laugh.

subtitles.original: 既に君はもう 出来上がってる
subtitles.english: You're already completely under my spell.

subtitles.original: 頭で次の 次の次まで 見通さなくちゃ
subtitles.english:
I have to see ahead in my mind to the
next, and the one after that.

subtitles.original: Lookin' Seekin' Touchin' Feelin'
subtitles.english: Lookin' Seekin' Touchin' Feelin'

subtitles.original: Ready?
subtitles.english: Ready?

subtitles.original: 唯一無二のジョーカー 手にするために
subtitles.english: To get your hands on the one and only Joker,

subtitles.original: 欲望さらけ出してる
subtitles.english: you're exposing all your desires.

subtitles.original: ホット 離れていく
subtitles.english: Hot, the logic of the world

subtitles.original: 世界のロジック
subtitles.english: is drifting away.

subtitles.original: 君も楽しめるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you can enjoy it.

subtitles.original: キミと 重要なキーワード
subtitles.english: With you, the important keywords

subtitles.original: 全てシークレット
subtitles.english: are all secret.

subtitles.original: 後戻りは できないステージへ
subtitles.english: To a stage where there's no turning back.

subtitles.original: 気づいてるでしょ ここにいる意味さえも
subtitles.english:
You've noticed, haven't you? Even the meaning
of being here.

subtitles.original: 切り札はそれぞれ 互いの手札に
subtitles.english: The trump cards are in each other's hands.

subtitles.original: 頭と心で 暴き出して
subtitles.english: Uncover it with your mind and heart

subtitles.original: 胸を撃ち抜け
subtitles.english: and shoot right through my chest!

subtitles.original: 自覚ないでしょうね 思い通りに
subtitles.english: You probably don't realize it, but you're being

subtitles.original: 君は動かされている
subtitles.english: moved exactly as I intended.

subtitles.original: ごっと 単純じゃないの
subtitles.english: God, it's not that simple.

subtitles.original: 駆け引きの火を
subtitles.english: Pick up all the sparks

subtitles.original: 全て拾って
subtitles.english: of our bargaining.

subtitles.original: 唯一無二のジョーカー 手にすることで
subtitles.english: By taking hold of the one and only Joker,

subtitles.original: 理解できた愛の形
subtitles.english: I've finally understood the shape of love.
